resources.string: What time do you usually go to sleep at night?
How long does it take you to fall into a deep sleep?
How many nights a week do you have trouble sleeping?
How many hours did you sleep each night on average?
How would you rate your sleeping quality on average?
Depends if school nights or weekends
Sleepker app is designed to help you monitor your sleeping patterns. Before we get started, please login or sign up to continue.
To keep tracking your sleep, please login using your personal information.
Let\'s get you all set up so you can start exploring the app.
Please enter your registered email address and we\'ll send you a link to reset your password.
Now let\'s get to know you and your sleeping habits to validate your sign up request.
Enter your new data in the provided field and press update to save your changes.
To help us determine your sleep quality, please select your wake up mood below.
